sentences.sentence: There were no adverse toxicological effects.
JECFA finally recommended that acrylamide be re-evaluated when results of on-going toxicological studies become available.
sentences.translation: 食品添加剂联合专家委员会最后建议在目前正进行的毒理学研究结果出来以后对丙烯酰胺进行重新评价。

sentences.sentence: National Center for Toxicological Research is established in the biological facilities of the Pine Bluff Arsenal in Arkansas.
sentences.translation: 国家毒理学研究中心在阿肯色州松崖兵工厂的生物学机构中建立。
